name: CISampler
desc: An object that retrieves pixel samples for processing by a filter kernel.

items.name: init(image: CIImage)
items.desc: Initializes a sampler with an image object.

items.name: init(image: CIImage, options: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Initializes the sampler with an image object using options specified in a dictionary.

items.name: var definition: CIFilterShape
items.desc: The domain of definition (DOD) of the sampler

items.name: var extent: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangle that specifies the extent of the sampler
